column1: About Ogilvy:

Ogilvy UK has been creating iconic ideas that deliver impact at scale for clients ever since David Ogilvy founded the company in 1948. Ogilvy UK specialises in bringing together brand advertising, customer experience marketing, PR, influence and consulting, all fuelled by Behavioural Science. Our world-class award-winning creative campaigns deliver solutions for clients including Molson Coors (owner of Madrí beer), Valeo Foods UK (owner of Kettle Chips and Rowse Honey), Argos, Mondelēz International, Unilever, TK Maxx and Pernod Ricard.

In 2023, Ogilvy UK celebrated their 75th anniversary and was the most awarded agency in Europe. Ogilvy is home to the largest influencer marketing practice globally and hosts the world’s biggest festival of behavioural science and creativity, Nudgestock – now in its 12th year.
The Role:

Are you ready to lead the way as an Account Manager for our world-leading creative agency? Join our vibrant, dynamic, and multi-disciplined team and unleash your passion for delivering exceptional work. As an integral part of our team, you'll collaborate closely with the Account Director/Senior Client Lead, managing a diverse range of projects that span from smaller standalone activities to complex, multi-touchpoint campaigns that drive brand consideration. Get ready to ignite your creativity with performance-driven activations and unique initiatives that tap into culture, creating a deeper engagement with our most awarded and prestigious client, Dove.

Speaking of Dove, this iconic brand has a rich history of ground-breaking communications. From its revolutionary 'beauty bar' in 1957 to the iconic 'Campaign for Real Beauty' initiated in 2004, Dove has always been at the forefront of redefining beauty standards. As an Account Manager, you'll be part of our enduring partnership, driving real and lasting social change. Be prepared to challenge the status quo and develop innovative campaigns that make beauty a source of confidence, not anxiety, for women around the world.

Now, let's talk about you. As an experienced Account Manager, we're seeking someone who thrives on collaboration and has a knack for managing global projects. With your strategic thinking and multi-disciplinary experience, you'll play a pivotal role in delivering fully integrated campaigns that leave a lasting impact. You'll take the lead on specific deliverables across various channels, ensuring their seamless execution internally and with the client team. Your outstanding relationship-building skills will shine as you foster strong connections with clients, bringing their vision to life while keeping a keen eye on deadlines and workflow coordination.

In this fast-paced and ever-changing environment, you'll need to be resilient, adaptable, and capable of juggling multiple projects with finesse. Your proactive planning and foresight will be invaluable as you anticipate future needs and navigate through challenges. Your communication prowess, both verbal and written, will allow you to articulate your ideas effectively, negotiate with finesse, and deliver compelling presentations. Above all, your positive attitude, energy, and passion for the Personal Care category will make you an invaluable team player, driving us forward in our quest to maintain Dove's position as the world's most meaningful beauty brand.
Key Responsibilities:
Demonstrated experience in managing and delivering integrated projects, collaborating closely with the Business Partner (BP) to ensure successful execution.
Proven ability to effectively manage and mentor an Account Executive, delegating tasks, providing support, and fostering their professional growth.
Multi-disciplinary experience, capable of contributing to the development and execution of fully integrated campaigns across various channels.
Strategic thinker who can align campaign objectives with the client's brief and confidently voice opinions and insights.
Ownership of specific deliverables within projects, such as TV, digital, and print, taking the lead in managing them both internally and with the client team.
Excellent capacity for handling multiple deliverables simultaneously, while maintaining attention to detail and meeting deadlines.
Strong relationship-building skills, particularly at the Brand Manager level, to establish and maintain robust client partnerships.
Ability to ensure alignment and coordination among the Brand, creative, and production teams throughout the project lifecycle.
Proactive planning and foresight, anticipating future needs and challenges to effectively navigate the fast-paced agency environment.
Resilience and adaptability in the face of changing circumstances, capable of managing client requests or issue escalations with composure and professionalism.
Requirements:
Proven ability to cultivate strong and long-lasting client relationships, earning their trust and becoming a trusted advisor.
Strong strategic mindset, with the ability to analyse market trends, identify opportunities, and develop innovative solutions that align with client goals.
Sound understanding of business principles and financial management, enabling effective budgeting, forecasting, and resource allocation.
Excellent negotiation skills, capable of navigating complex client discussions, resolving conflicts, and achieving win-win outcomes.
Exceptional presentation abilities, with the talent to deliver compelling and engaging pitches to clients and stakeholders.
